attributes.action: award a honorary knighthood to Omer Golan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Omer Golan scored the winning goal for Israel in their 2-1 win over Russia in football's Euro 2008 Qualifiying Group E on November 17th 2007. This has given the English national side a huge opportunity to qualify for the tournament finals in Austria and Switzerland. Therefore I propose that Omer Golan is awarded a honanry knighthood for services to sport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
